contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} '''JCB''' is a [[three-letter abbreviation]] with multiple meanings, as described below: {{TOC right}} ==Companies== * [[J. C. Bamford]] (JCB), a British manufacturer of heavy industrial and agricultural vehicles ** By extension, slang for any [[backhoe]] digger/excavator in Britain and Europe * [[Japan Credit Bureau]], a credit card company based in Tokyo, Japan ==Products== * [[JCB (song)|"JCB" (song)]], a song by Nizlopi featuring a JCB excavator * JCB, a beer brewed by the [[Wadworth Brewery]] in Devizes, Wiltshire * ''[[Journal of Cell Biology]]'', a weekly biology journal by the Rockefeller University Press * ''[[Journal of Crustacean Biology]]'', a quarterly biology journal specialising in carcinology ==People== * [[Johann Christian Bach]], a composer * [[Jean-Christophe Boullion]], a racing car driver * [[Jason Charles Bourne]], Robert Ludlum's fictional character * [[John Cawte Beaglehole]], New Zealand historian ==Others== * ''Juris Canonici Baccalaureus'', Bachelor of [[Canon Law]] degree * [[University of Toronto Joint Centre for Bioethics]], a research centre * [[Joint Cipher Bureau]], agency of the Indian armed forces responsible for signals intelligence and cryptanalysis * 'Jac Codi Baw' is the Welsh child's name for a J.C.B digger machine, and it translates literally as Jack Dig Dirt {{disambig}}
